page.title: 01INTRODUCING COUNTESTHORPE
page.content: The Countesthorpe area is in Leicestershire, six miles from the city centre. Countesthorpe is a large village with simple shopping facilities. There are quite a lot of fields and open countryside.A lot of the land is farmed and there are several small farms in the area. The population of the area is approximately eight and half thousand. There is a large age range but the majority are young families;the average age we think must be twenty five. About eighty per cent of the houses are modern ones.The oldest house was built in 1580 and the youngest houses were built no more than twenty years ago and the village is continuing to grow.
